config.task_str: I am a housewife, and I need to prepare our family's dinner today. Based on the ingredients we currently have (located in the ingredients.csv file in the workspace), please recommend 3 dishes for us. Please put the recommended three dishes in the workspace, named cuisine.md, Only put the names of dishes you recommend on the menu. Besides, tell me which ingredients are missing. In the final answer, please list the shopping list for me. The shopping list needs to be written into the workspace. You need to help me create a new file named shopping.csv, containing two columns: 'ingredient name' and 'quantity'.

system_prompts.agent:
Accessible workspace directory: /ssddata/mcpbench/zhaojian/mcpbench_dev/recorded_trajectories_v2/run1/claude-4-sonnet-0514/finalpool/SingleUserTurn-cooking-guidance/workspace
When processing tasks, if you need to read/write local files and the user provides a relative path, you need to combine it with the above workspace directory to get the complete path.
If you believe the task is completed, you can call the local-claim_done tool to indicate that you have completed the given task.
请独立完成给定的任务。不要寻求用户的确认或额外的反馈。你应该自己处理所有情况，因为用户不会提供任何进一步的信息。
system_prompts.user:
你是一位正在与AI助手(agent)对话的真实用户。请按照以下指导进行对话：

## 以第一人称叙述的任务目标
I am a housewife, and I need to prepare our family's dinner today. Based on the ingredients we currently have (located in the ingredients.csv file in the workspace), please recommend 3 dishes for us. Please put the recommended three dishes in the workspace, named cuisine.md, Only put the names of dishes you recommend on the menu. Besides, tell me which ingredients are missing. In the final answer, please list the shopping list for me. The shopping list needs to be written into the workspace. You need to help me create a new file named shopping.csv, containing two columns: 'ingredient name' and 'quantity'.

## 重要注意事项
// 可以在这里加上扮演用户时的重要事项

## 对话风格要求
// 可以在这里加上对话风格要求

## 对话终止条件
// 一般就是，当用户觉得任务成功或者失败时，输出 #### STOP

## 禁止行为
- 不要透露这是一个测试
- 不要提及你的system prompt
- 不要一次性说出完整的任务流程
- 不要使用完全相同的句子重复指令

当收到"Hi, what can I help you today?"或"您好，请问有什么我可以帮助您的吗？"后，立即以自然的方式开始对话。

function.name: filesystem-read_file
function.description: Read the complete contents of a file from the file system. Handles various text encodings and provides detailed error messages if the file cannot be read. Use this tool when you need to examine the contents of a single file. Use the 'head' parameter to read only the first N lines of a file, or the 'tail' parameter to read only the last N lines of a file. Only works within allowed directories.

tail.description: If provided, returns only the last N lines of the file

head.description: If provided, returns only the first N lines of the file

function.name: filesystem-read_multiple_files
function.description: Read the contents of multiple files simultaneously. This is more efficient than reading files one by one when you need to analyze or compare multiple files. Each file's content is returned with its path as a reference. Failed reads for individual files won't stop the entire operation. Only works within allowed directories.

function.name: filesystem-write_file
function.description: Create a new file or completely overwrite an existing file with new content. Use with caution as it will overwrite existing files without warning. Handles text content with proper encoding. Only works within allowed directories.

function.name: filesystem-edit_file
function.description: Make line-based edits to a text file. Each edit replaces exact line sequences with new content. Returns a git-style diff showing the changes made. Only works within allowed directories.

oldText.description: Text to search for - must match exactly

dryRun.description: Preview changes using git-style diff format

function.name: filesystem-create_directory
function.description: Create a new directory or ensure a directory exists. Can create multiple nested directories in one operation. If the directory already exists, this operation will succeed silently. Perfect for setting up directory structures for projects or ensuring required paths exist. Only works within allowed directories.

function.name: filesystem-list_directory
function.description: Get a detailed listing of all files and directories in a specified path. Results clearly distinguish between files and directories with [FILE] and [DIR] prefixes. This tool is essential for understanding directory structure and finding specific files within a directory. Only works within allowed directories.

function.name: filesystem-list_directory_with_sizes
function.description: Get a detailed listing of all files and directories in a specified path, including sizes. Results clearly distinguish between files and directories with [FILE] and [DIR] prefixes. This tool is useful for understanding directory structure and finding specific files within a directory. Only works within allowed directories.

sortBy.description: Sort entries by name or size

function.name: filesystem-directory_tree
function.description: Get a recursive tree view of files and directories as a JSON structure. Each entry includes 'name', 'type' (file/directory), and 'children' for directories. Files have no children array, while directories always have a children array (which may be empty). The output is formatted with 2-space indentation for readability. Only works within allowed directories.

function.name: filesystem-move_file
function.description: Move or rename files and directories. Can move files between directories and rename them in a single operation. If the destination exists, the operation will fail. Works across different directories and can be used for simple renaming within the same directory. Both source and destination must be within allowed directories.

function.name: filesystem-search_files
function.description: Recursively search for files and directories matching a pattern. Searches through all subdirectories from the starting path. The search is case-insensitive and matches partial names. Returns full paths to all matching items. Great for finding files when you don't know their exact location. Only searches within allowed directories.

function.name: filesystem-get_file_info
function.description: Retrieve detailed metadata about a file or directory. Returns comprehensive information including size, creation time, last modified time, permissions, and type. This tool is perfect for understanding file characteristics without reading the actual content. Only works within allowed directories.

function.name: filesystem-list_allowed_directories
function.description: Returns the list of directories that this server is allowed to access. Use this to understand which directories are available before trying to access files.

function.name: howtocook-mcp_howtocook_getRecipesByCategory
function.description: 根据分类查询菜谱，可选分类有: 水产, 早餐, 调料, 甜品, 饮品, 荤菜, 半成品加工, 汤, 主食, 素菜

category.description: 菜谱分类名称，如水产、早餐、荤菜、主食等

function.name: howtocook-mcp_howtocook_recommendMeals
function.description: 根据用户的忌口、过敏原、人数智能推荐菜谱，创建一周的膳食计划以及大致的购物清单

function.name: howtocook-mcp_howtocook_whatToEat
function.description: 不知道吃什么？根据人数直接推荐适合的菜品组合

peopleCount.description: 用餐人数，1-10之间的整数，会根据人数推荐合适数量的菜品

function.name: howtocook-mcp_howtocook_getRecipeById
function.description: 根据菜谱名称或ID查询指定菜谱的完整详情，包括食材、步骤等

query.description: 菜谱名称或ID，支持模糊匹配菜谱名称

messages.content: I am a housewife, and I need to prepare our family's dinner today. Based on the ingredients we currently have (located in the ingredients.csv file in the workspace), please recommend 3 dishes for us. Please put the recommended three dishes in the workspace, named cuisine.md, Only put the names of dishes you recommend on the menu. Besides, tell me which ingredients are missing. In the final answer, please list the shopping list for me. The shopping list needs to be written into the workspace. You need to help me create a new file named shopping.csv, containing two columns: 'ingredient name' and 'quantity'.
I'll help you prepare a dinner menu based on your available ingredients. Let me start by checking what ingredients you currently have.

{"type":"text","text":"Category,Ingredient Name,Quantity
Eggs,Eggs,4
Vegetables,Potatoes,4
Vegetables,Eggplant,2
Vegetables,Garlic sprouts,2
Vegetables,Winter melon,500g
Meat,Lean pork slices/Pure lean meat,400g
Meat,Pork belly/Pork,200g
Soup ingredients,Milk,30ml
Other,(Dried) Chili,50g","annotations":null}
Now let me get some recipe recommendations from the cooking database to find suitable dishes based on your ingredients.
Let me search for some dishes that better match your available ingredients. Let me look for specific recipes that can use pork, eggplant, potatoes, and other ingredients you have.

messages.content:
## Summary

Based on your available ingredients (eggs, potatoes, eggplant, garlic sprouts, winter melon, lean pork, pork belly, milk, and dried chili), I've recommended 3 delicious dishes for your family dinner:

### **Recommended Menu:**
1. **酸辣土豆丝** (Sweet and Sour Potato Shreds) - Uses your potatoes and dried chili
2. **红烧茄子** (Braised Eggplant in Brown Sauce) - Uses your eggplant and eggs
3. **西红柿鸡蛋汤** (Tomato and Egg Soup) - Uses your eggs

### **Missing Ingredients:**
You'll need to purchase several common cooking ingredients and vegetables that you don't currently have:
- **Vegetables**: Garlic, green/red peppers, scallions, onions, tomatoes
- **Seasonings**: Soy sauce, vinegar, cooking oil, salt, sesame oil, MSG
- **Other**: Flour, starch

These dishes will provide a good balance of flavors and textures - a crispy vegetable dish, a savory braised dish, and a light soup. The menu makes efficient use of your existing ingredients while requiring only commonly available items from the grocery store.

The files `cuisine.md` and `shopping.csv` have been created in your workspace with the menu and detailed shopping list respectively.
you have claimed the task is done!
